availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Armendt (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, Carpenter)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, carpenter. Native of Germany. Married to Matilda H. Armendt. Father of Matilda Armendt, Lewis Armendt, Henry Armendt, William Armendt, Albert Armendt, Laura Armendt, Hellen Armendt, Mary Armendt. Carpenter in Hartford, Ohio County in 1870.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford, p. 28.
Find A Grave, "Henry Armendt (April 30, 1826- May 18, 1910)," Memorial #20935395, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/20935395 (accessed January 4, 2019).
